He then spent a year investigating and interviewing the team of experts across the country who worked as advocates for the dogs and their rehabilitation. Fighting dogs, especially pit bulls, are almost always considered beyond help and euthanized. So this was a landmark legal decision to allow a team of experts to come in and attempt to restore the unimaginable damage inflicted upon these dogs. The rehabilitation of Michael Vick 's dogs was kept secret at first, even though his trial gained national attention, in order to protect the dogs from thieves of the dog fighting underworld. And Simon Cowell made little secret that he was bored and ready to get on to his next series, The X Factor,`` already a hit in Britain and scheduled to launch stateside this fall. Ellen DeGeneres , Ms. Paula Abdul 's replacement, never jelled with the other judges, including singer Kara DioGuardi , who had been brought on for the 2009 season to bolster the show in advance of Ms. Paula Abdul 's expected departure. Now Ms. Ellen DeGeneres and Ms. Kara DioGuardi are both gone.
